caption.p: Study model of human primary muscle cells. Human primary mononucleated myoblasts (left panel), cultured in vitro, are differentiated into multinucleated myotubes (right panel). Muscle cells are labeled by an anti-desmin mouse antibody, and a secondary goat anti-mouse monoclonal antibody (green staining), and nuclei by DAPI staining. Magnification: 200Ã—.
